job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongWho We Are brbrstrongNvisia partners with clients to help them adopt new technologies build great software and enable their teams We do this by working alongside client developers giving them a voice in the solution and providing them with a sense of ownership from the beginning Our consultants are passionate about technology robust architecture and software craftmanship They know that building great software starts with building great teams Internally nvisia emphasizes attracting retaining and growing individuals who are passionate about their craft and continually improving their skills We are a group of creative problemsolvers with a shared desire to learn grow and work collaboratively to find solutions for our clients that they can sustain longtermbrbrstrong Who You Are brbrstrongYou are a Software Engineer passionate about technology naturally solution oriented excelling at problem solving You embrace change eager to learn new domains as well as technologies You are seeking to create a lasting impact in every opportunity focusing on building software that sustainsbrbrstrong Responsibilities brstrongulliUtilizes sound engineering
